articles.title: Are investors finally nervous about the US debt ceiling? - BBC
articles.description: The US is running out of time to reach a debt ceiling deal. So is Wall Street getting nervous?
articles.content:
Negotiations to prevent the US government from running out of money are headed down to the wire.
The Treasury says Congress must agree to raise the debt ceiling by 1 June or the US will run out of c… [+4496 chars]
